response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its worth to you, we propose an offer of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This price reflects not only its market value but also the potential benefits it can bring to your business. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 12000}
